00034 ImageManager::ImageManager()
00035 {
00036     need_update = true;
00037     osl_texture_system = NULL;
00038 }
00039 
00040 ImageManager::~ImageManager()
00041 {
00042     for(size_t slot = 0; slot < images.size(); slot++)
00043         assert(!images[slot]);
00044     for(size_t slot = 0; slot < float_images.size(); slot++)
00045         assert(!float_images[slot]);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void ImageManager::set_osl_texture_system(void *texture_system)
00049 {
00050     osl_texture_system = texture_system;
00051 }
00052 
00053 static bool is_float_image(const string& filename)
00054 {
00055     ImageInput *in = ImageInput::create(filename);
00056     bool is_float = false;
00057 
00058     if(in) {
00059         ImageSpec spec;
00060 
00061         if(in->open(filename, spec)) {
00062             /* check the main format, and channel formats;
00063                if any are non-integer, we'll need a float texture slot */
00064             if(spec.format == TypeDesc::HALF ||
00065                spec.format == TypeDesc::FLOAT ||
00066                spec.format == TypeDesc::DOUBLE) {
00067                 is_float = true;
00068             }
00069 
00070             for(size_t channel = 0; channel < spec.channelformats.size(); channel++) {
00071                 if(spec.channelformats[channel] == TypeDesc::HALF ||
00072                    spec.channelformats[channel] == TypeDesc::FLOAT ||
00073                    spec.channelformats[channel] == TypeDesc::DOUBLE) {
00074                     is_float = true;
00075                 }
00076             }
00077 
00078             in->close();
00079         }
00080 
00081         delete in;
00082     }
00083 
00084     return is_float;
00085 }
00086 
00087 int ImageManager::add_image(const string& filename, bool& is_float)
00088 {
00089     Image *img;
00090     size_t slot;
00091 
00092     /* load image info and find out if we need a float texture */
00093     is_float = is_float_image(filename);
00094 
00095     if(is_float) {
00096         /* find existing image */
00097         for(slot = 0; slot < float_images.size(); slot++) {
00098             if(float_images[slot] && float_images[slot]->filename == filename) {
00099                 float_images[slot]->users++;
00100                 return slot+TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START;
00101             }
00102         }
00103 
00104         /* find free slot */
00105         for(slot = 0; slot < float_images.size(); slot++) {
00106             if(!float_images[slot])
00107                 break;
00108         }
00109 
00110         if(slot == float_images.size()) {
00111             /* max images limit reached */
00112             if(float_images.size() == TEX_NUM_FLOAT_IMAGES)
00113                 return -1;
00114 
00115             float_images.resize(float_images.size() + 1);
00116         }
00117 
00118         /* add new image */
00119         img = new Image();
00120         img->filename = filename;
00121         img->need_load = true;
00122         img->users = 1;
00123 
00124         float_images[slot] = img;
00125         /* report slot out of total set of textures */
00126         slot += TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START;
00127     }
00128     else {
00129         for(slot = 0; slot < images.size(); slot++) {
00130             if(images[slot] && images[slot]->filename == filename) {
00131                 images[slot]->users++;
00132                 return slot;
00133             }
00134         }
00135 
00136         /* find free slot */
00137         for(slot = 0; slot < images.size(); slot++) {
00138             if(!images[slot])
00139                 break;
00140         }
00141 
00142         if(slot == images.size()) {
00143             /* max images limit reached */
00144             if(images.size() == TEX_NUM_IMAGES)
00145                 return -1;
00146 
00147             images.resize(images.size() + 1);
00148         }
00149 
00150         /* add new image */
00151         img = new Image();
00152         img->filename = filename;
00153         img->need_load = true;
00154         img->users = 1;
00155 
00156         images[slot] = img;
00157     }
00158     need_update = true;
00159 
00160     return slot;
00161 }
00162 
00163 void ImageManager::remove_image(const string& filename)
00164 {
00165     size_t slot;
00166 
00167     for(slot = 0; slot < images.size(); slot++) {
00168         if(images[slot] && images[slot]->filename == filename) {
00169             /* decrement user count */
00170             images[slot]->users--;
00171             assert(images[slot]->users >= 0);
00172 
00173             /* don't remove immediately, rather do it all together later on. one of
00174                the reasons for this is that on shader changes we add and remove nodes
00175                that use them, but we do not want to reload the image all the time. */
00176             if(images[slot]->users == 0)
00177                 need_update = true;
00178 
00179             break;
00180         }
00181     }
00182 
00183     if(slot == images.size()) {
00184         /* see if it's in a float texture slot */
00185         for(slot = 0; slot < float_images.size(); slot++) {
00186             if(float_images[slot] && float_images[slot]->filename == filename) {
00187                 /* decrement user count */
00188                 float_images[slot]->users--;
00189                 assert(float_images[slot]->users >= 0);
00190 
00191                 /* don't remove immediately, rather do it all together later on. one of
00192                    the reasons for this is that on shader changes we add and remove nodes
00193                    that use them, but we do not want to reload the image all the time. */
00194                 if(float_images[slot]->users == 0)
00195                     need_update = true;
00196 
00197                 break;
00198             }
00199         }
00200     }
00201 }
00202 
00203 bool ImageManager::file_load_image(Image *img, device_vector<uchar4>& tex_img)
00204 {
00205     if(img->filename == "")
00206         return false;
00207 
00208     /* load image from file through OIIO */
00209     ImageInput *in = ImageInput::create(img->filename);
00210 
00211     if(!in)
00212         return false;
00213 
00214     ImageSpec spec;
00215 
00216     if(!in->open(img->filename, spec)) {
00217         delete in;
00218         return false;
00219     }
00220 
00221     /* we only handle certain number of components */
00222     int width = spec.width;
00223     int height = spec.height;
00224     int components = spec.nchannels;
00225 
00226     if(!(components == 1 || components == 3 || components == 4)) {
00227         in->close();
00228         delete in;
00229         return false;
00230     }
00231 
00232     /* read RGBA pixels */
00233     uchar *pixels = (uchar*)tex_img.resize(width, height);
00234     int scanlinesize = width*components*sizeof(uchar);
00235 
00236     in->read_image(TypeDesc::UINT8,
00237         (uchar*)pixels + (height-1)*scanlinesize,
00238         AutoStride,
00239         -scanlinesize,
00240         AutoStride);
00241 
00242     in->close();
00243     delete in;
00244 
00245     if(components == 3) {
00246         for(int i = width*height-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00247             pixels[i*4+3] = 255;
00248             pixels[i*4+2] = pixels[i*3+2];
00249             pixels[i*4+1] = pixels[i*3+1];
00250             pixels[i*4+0] = pixels[i*3+0];
00251         }
00252     }
00253     else if(components == 1) {
00254         for(int i = width*height-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00255             pixels[i*4+3] = 255;
00256             pixels[i*4+2] = pixels[i];
00257             pixels[i*4+1] = pixels[i];
00258             pixels[i*4+0] = pixels[i];
00259         }
00260     }
00261 
00262     return true;
00263 }
00264 
00265 bool ImageManager::file_load_float_image(Image *img, device_vector<float4>& tex_img)
00266 {
00267     if(img->filename == "")
00268         return false;
00269 
00270     /* load image from file through OIIO */
00271     ImageInput *in = ImageInput::create(img->filename);
00272 
00273     if(!in)
00274         return false;
00275 
00276     ImageSpec spec;
00277 
00278     if(!in->open(img->filename, spec)) {
00279         delete in;
00280         return false;
00281     }
00282 
00283     /* we only handle certain number of components */
00284     int width = spec.width;
00285     int height = spec.height;
00286     int components = spec.nchannels;
00287 
00288     if(!(components == 1 || components == 3 || components == 4)) {
00289         in->close();
00290         delete in;
00291         return false;
00292     }
00293 
00294     /* read RGBA pixels */
00295     float *pixels = (float*)tex_img.resize(width, height);
00296     int scanlinesize = width*components*sizeof(float);
00297 
00298     in->read_image(TypeDesc::FLOAT,
00299         (uchar*)pixels + (height-1)*scanlinesize,
00300         AutoStride,
00301         -scanlinesize,
00302         AutoStride);
00303 
00304     in->close();
00305     delete in;
00306 
00307     if(components == 3) {
00308         for(int i = width*height-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00309             pixels[i*4+3] = 1.0f;
00310             pixels[i*4+2] = pixels[i*3+2];
00311             pixels[i*4+1] = pixels[i*3+1];
00312             pixels[i*4+0] = pixels[i*3+0];
00313         }
00314     }
00315     else if(components == 1) {
00316         for(int i = width*height-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00317             pixels[i*4+3] = 1.0f;
00318             pixels[i*4+2] = pixels[i];
00319             pixels[i*4+1] = pixels[i];
00320             pixels[i*4+0] = pixels[i];
00321         }
00322     }
00323 
00324     return true;
00325 }
00326 
00327 void ImageManager::device_load_image(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, int slot)
00328 {
00329     if(osl_texture_system)
00330         return;
00331 
00332     Image *img;
00333     bool is_float;
00334 
00335     if(slot < TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START) {
00336         img = images[slot];
00337         is_float = false;
00338     }
00339     else {
00340         img = float_images[slot - TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START];
00341         is_float = true;
00342     }
00343 
00344     if(is_float) {
00345         device_vector<float4>& tex_img = dscene->tex_float_image[slot - TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START];
00346 
00347         if(tex_img.device_pointer)
00348             device->tex_free(tex_img);
00349 
00350         if(!file_load_float_image(img, tex_img)) {
00351             /* on failure to load, we set a 1x1 pixels black image */
00352             float *pixels = (float*)tex_img.resize(1, 1);
00353 
00354             pixels[0] = 0.0f;
00355             pixels[1] = 0.0f;
00356             pixels[2] = 0.0f;
00357             pixels[3] = 0.0f;
00358         }
00359 
00360         string name;
00361 
00362         if(slot >= 10) name = string_printf("__tex_image_float_0%d", slot);
00363         else name = string_printf("__tex_image_float_00%d", slot);
00364 
00365         device->tex_alloc(name.c_str(), tex_img, true, true);
00366     }
00367     else {
00368         device_vector<uchar4>& tex_img = dscene->tex_image[slot];
00369 
00370         if(tex_img.device_pointer)
00371             device->tex_free(tex_img);
00372 
00373         if(!file_load_image(img, tex_img)) {
00374             /* on failure to load, we set a 1x1 pixels black image */
00375             uchar *pixels = (uchar*)tex_img.resize(1, 1);
00376 
00377             pixels[0] = 0;
00378             pixels[1] = 0;
00379             pixels[2] = 0;
00380             pixels[3] = 0;
00381         }
00382 
00383         string name;
00384 
00385         if(slot >= 10) name = string_printf("__tex_image_0%d", slot);
00386         else name = string_printf("__tex_image_00%d", slot);
00387 
00388         device->tex_alloc(name.c_str(), tex_img, true, true);
00389     }
00390 }
00391 
00392 void ImageManager::device_free_image(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, int slot)
00393 {
00394     Image *img;
00395     bool is_float;
00396 
00397     if(slot < TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START) {
00398         img = images[slot];
00399         is_float = false;
00400     }
00401     else {
00402         img = float_images[slot - TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START];
00403         is_float = true;
00404     }
00405 
00406     if(img) {
00407         if(osl_texture_system) {
00408 #ifdef WITH_OSL
00409             ustring filename(images[slot]->filename);
00410             ((OSL::TextureSystem*)osl_texture_system)->invalidate(filename);
00411 #endif
00412         }
00413         else if(is_float) {
00414             device->tex_free(dscene->tex_float_image[slot - TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START]);
00415             dscene->tex_float_image[slot - TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START].clear();
00416 
00417             delete float_images[slot - TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START];
00418             float_images[slot - TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START] = NULL;
00419         }
00420         else {
00421             device->tex_free(dscene->tex_image[slot]);
00422             dscene->tex_image[slot].clear();
00423 
00424             delete images[slot];
00425             images[slot] = NULL;
00426         }
00427     }
00428 }
00429 
00430 void ImageManager::device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, Progress& progress)
00431 {
00432     if(!need_update)
00433         return;
00434 
00435     for(size_t slot = 0; slot < images.size(); slot++) {
00436         if(images[slot]) {
00437             if(images[slot]->users == 0) {
00438                 device_free_image(device, dscene, slot);
00439             }
00440             else if(images[slot]->need_load) {
00441                 string name = path_filename(images[slot]->filename);
00442                 progress.set_status("Updating Images", "Loading " + name);
00443                 device_load_image(device, dscene, slot);
00444                 images[slot]->need_load = false;
00445             }
00446 
00447             if(progress.get_cancel()) return;
00448         }
00449     }
00450 
00451     for(size_t slot = 0; slot < float_images.size(); slot++) {
00452         if(float_images[slot]) {
00453             if(float_images[slot]->users == 0) {
00454                 device_free_image(device, dscene, slot + TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START);
00455             }
00456             else if(float_images[slot]->need_load) {
00457                 string name = path_filename(float_images[slot]->filename);
00458                 progress.set_status("Updating Images", "Loading " + name);
00459                 device_load_image(device, dscene, slot + TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START);
00460                 float_images[slot]->need_load = false;
00461             }
00462 
00463             if(progress.get_cancel()) return;
00464         }
00465     }
00466 
00467     need_update = false;
00468 }
00469 
00470 void ImageManager::device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00471 {
00472     for(size_t slot = 0; slot < images.size(); slot++)
00473         device_free_image(device, dscene, slot);
00474     for(size_t slot = 0; slot < float_images.size(); slot++)
00475         device_free_image(device, dscene, slot + TEX_IMAGE_FLOAT_START);
00476 
00477     images.clear();
00478     float_images.clear();
00479 }
